abstract.t: Virtual Private Networks (VPNs) based on Frame Relay or ATM circuitshave been around a long time. While these VPNs work well, the costsof maintaining separate networks for Internet traffic and VPNs andthe administrative burden of provisioning these VPNs have led ServiceProviders to look for alternative solutions. In this document, wepresent a VPN solution where from the customer's point of view, theVPN is based on Layer 2 circuits, but the Service Provider maintainsand manages a single MPLS-based network for IP, MPLS IP VPNs, andLayer 2 VPNs.
